name: storyhouse-vip
description: Revolutionary Web3 Storytelling Platform built on Story Protocol

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@storyhouse/shared && npm run build --workspace=@storyhouse/contracts && npm run build --workspace=@storyhouse/frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=@storyhouse/shared && npm run type-check --workspace=@storyhouse/frontend
scripts.cf:build: cd apps/frontend && CLOUDFLARE_BUILD=true npm run build
scripts.cf:dev: npm run cf:build && wrangler pages dev apps/frontend/out --compatibility-date=2024-06-07
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run cf:build && wrangler pages deploy apps/frontend/out
scripts.cf:deploy:staging: npm run cf:build && wrangler pages deploy apps/frontend/out --env staging
scripts.cf:deploy:production: npm run cf:build && wrangler pages deploy apps/frontend/out --env production

author: StoryHouse.vip Team
